sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Actions are the base schema for real estate events.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/docs/actions.html"}}>{`https://schema.org/Action`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"reflex-actions"}}>{`REflex Actions`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The following actions are currently being used by REflex applications.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`action`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`example use case`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/AcceptAction"}}>{`AcceptAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`an assigned lead was accepted`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/AddAction"}}>{`AddAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`an object was added to a collection, for example a user's contact list or a consumer's saved properties list.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"#AskAction"}}>{`AskAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`a consumer has completed a question form on an office or agent website`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/AssignAction"}}>{`AssignAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`a lead has been assigned to an agent`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/AuthorizeAction"}}>{`AuthorizeAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`a REflex user authorized an Application to subscribe her inbox`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/InformAction"}}>{`InformAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`a listing update was sent to a website registered user`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/RegisterAction"}}>{`RegisterAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`consumer registers to receive listing updates from the recipient's website`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/RejectAction"}}>{`RejectAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`the agent has refused a lead assignment`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/ReturnAction"}}>{`ReturnAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`a rejected or deleted Lead was returned to sender`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/ScheduleAction"}}>{`ScheduleAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`website visitor has scheduled an appointment to see a property `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"#scheduleaction"}}>{`example`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/UnRegisterAction"}}>{`UnRegisterAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`consumer un-registers from the user website.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/UpdateAction"}}>{`UpdateAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`an object was updated on a website, in an application or some other user activity`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"examples"}}>{`Examples`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"action"}}>{`Action`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`All actions share the base schema.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-yaml"}}>{`# All Actions share these basic properties
type: Action

# The direct performer of the action
actor: {Person | Organization}
  type: Person
  name: Bob

# Anything used by the actor to perform the action
instrument: {Anything}
# action from the user's website
- type: WebSite
  id: http://bob-sells-real-estate.example.com
# action peformed in the user's web based CRM
- type: WebApplication
  id: https://crm.example.com

# A co-actor or related directly or indirectly to the action.
participant: {Person | Organization}
- type: Person
  email: alice@example.com
  
# The object upon which the action is carried out.
# e.g. Bob viewed a :Listing or saved a Search
object: {Anything}
- type: WebSite
  id: https://bob-sells-real-estate.example.com

# Something created as a direct or indirect (side-effect) of the action.
# e.g. the actor created a new listing
result:
- type: RealEstateListing
  id: http://example.com/listing/{id}

# Use startTime and endTime for actions that have a duration
# Format [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm] (see Chapter 5.4 of ISO 8601).
startTime: '2013-09-14T21:30Z'
endTime: '2013-09-15T21:30Z
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"askaction"}}>{`AskAction`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-yaml"}}>{`'@context':
  '@vocab': https://yodata.io/yodata/real_estate#
  schema: https://schema.org/
  hsf: https://... # namespace for HSF/REflex terms
  smarter-agent: https://... # namespace for vendor specific properties
  
type: AskAction
id: 'https://api.smarteragent.com/1.0/prospects/4746861905023846710'

#:= schema:agent
#:range :Person :id
actor:
  type: Person
  givenName: Shawn
  familyName: Van der poel
  telephone: '000-867-5309'
  email: 'svanderpoel+bhhs@smarteragent.com'
  identifier:
    smarter-agent:userID: '...'

#:description Anything used by the actor to perform the Action
#:range :Thing
instrument:
- type: MobileApplication
  name: BHHS Mobile...
  operatingSystem: IOS
- type: MobileDevice
    identifier:
      deviceGUIDs:
        - 3ad07835-7a03-4376-97f2-e765ef869245
        - 3ad07835-7a03-4376-97f2-e765ef869244
        
#:description The Person or Organization who is being asked or receiving the action.
#:range :Person :Organization :id
#:container :Set
recipient:
  - type: RealEstateOffice
    id: {office profile URI}
    identifier:
      #note: 'thridPartyID' typo is in smarter-agent source
      smarter-agent:thridPartyID: PA301 
      hsf:OfficeID: PA301

#:description The subject of the question. Can be a URL that identifies the subject.
#:range :id :Thing
about:
  type: RealEstateListing
  identifier:
    listingID: '7080011'
    listingKey: '121253510232'
    smarter-agent:propertyID: '...'
  listAgent:
    type: Person
    id: https://123.example.com/profile/card#me
    identifier:
      hsf:ContactID: 123
      hsf:ContactGUID: {guid}
      reso:ListAgentMlsId: {string}
  listOffice:
    type: RealEstateOffice
    id: https://pa301-1.ds.bhhsresource.com
   
#:description where the action took place, not the subject of the action.
location:
  type: Place
  name: Empire State Building
  geo:
    type: GeoCoordinates
    latitude: 40.75
    longitude: 73.98

#:description Vendor specific properties of the Action go here
additionalProperty:
  smarter-agent:
    mobileCarrier: AT&T
    platform: Apple
    deviceUsed: Iphone
    userID: '4696770519448778593'
    SAAppCode: BHHSMSTANT
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"addaction"}}>{`AddAction`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-yaml"}}>{`# AddAction example: the user has created a new CRM contact 
type: AddAction

# alice is the the user and the ID is alice's public profile URI
actor: 'https://alice.example.com/profile/card#me'

# something the agent used to complete or generate the Action
instrument: 'https://contacts.google.com'

# alias for object - proposed.
contact:
  type: Person
  name: Bob Buyer
  telephone: '867-5309'
  contactPoint:
  - 
    name: Work
    email: bobAtWork.example.com
  -
    name: Home
    email: bobAtHome.example.com
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"scheduleaction"}}>{`ScheduleAction`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-yaml"}}>{`#:ScheduleAction :example
#::description Betty (:actor) scheduled an appointment to view listing 12345 (:about)
type: ScheduleAction
# time the action was scheduled (not the appointment time)
startTime: '2013-09-01T10:30:34Z'
# the lead or person who initiated the appointment
actor:
  type: Person
  name: Betty Buyer
  email: [ betty@example.com ]
# reference the listing or page where the 
about:
- https://andyagent.example.com/listing/12345
object:
  type: Event
  name: 'Showing Appointment: 1008 Mountain Rd'
  # use multiple location addressees to schedule a "tour"
  location:
  - type: PostalAddress
    streetAddress: '1008 Mountain Road'
    addressLocality: Gotham City
    addressRegion: Gotham
    postalCode: '00000'
  # appointment start/end time
  startDate: '2013-09-14T21:30Z'
  endDate: '2013-09-14T22:30Z'
participant:
-
  type: RealEstateAgent
  id: 'https://andy.example.com/profile/card#me'
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
